Sinopse: Portrays the lives of nine desperate teenagers. Thrown too young into a seedy grown up world, these runaways and castaways survive, but just barely. Rat, the dumpster diver. All underage survivors fighting for life and love on the streets of downtown Seattle.—Fiona Kelleghan
